meanings.definition: A type of product manufactured by a particular company under a particular name.
meanings.sent1: The store sells various brands of shoes.
meanings.sent2: People trust well-known brands for quality products.
meanings.sent3: The cat only likes a specific brand of cat food.
meanings.sent4: Her brand of humor always brings a smile to my face.
meanings.sent5: The brand of chocolate she brought was delicious.

meanings.definition: A mark made by burning or otherwise, to indicate kind, grade, make, ownership, etc.
meanings.sent1: The cowboy's cattle had his brand on them.
meanings.sent2: The brand on the leather bag showed its authenticity.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly tried to brand his initials on the toast.
meanings.sent4: The brand on the tree marked it as property of the park.
meanings.sent5: The brand on the horse's flank identified its owner.

meanings.definition: A kind or variety of something distinguished by some distinctive characteristic.
meanings.sent1: The local market offers different brands of fresh produce.
meanings.sent2: Each brand of tea has a unique flavor profile.
meanings.sent3: She has a brand of dance moves that always impresses.
meanings.sent4: His brand of storytelling captivates audiences.
meanings.sent5: The brand of humor in the movie resonated with the audience.
